title: Spring’s Hottest Trend for Men? Normal Fashion - WSJ.com
text: Spring’s Hottest Trend for Men? Normal Fashion Reimagined classics like vests, trenches and topcoats give new life to workaday wear Photography by Thomas Lohr, Styling by Tom Van Dorpe Scroll Filson vest, $130, filson​.com, Dior Homme coat, scarf and pants, prices upon request, Dior Homme stores, Bally socks, $45, bally​.com, Asics sneakers, $109, asics​.com (worn throughout). FRESH TWIST Add unexpected punch to polished pieces. Prada coat, $2,760, and jumpsuit, $1,650, select Prada boutiques, Dior Homme shirt, price upon request, Dior Homme stores, and Brooks Brothers Red Fleece tie, $50, brooksbrothers​.com. INDUSTRIAL ZONE Rough things up with utilitarian items.Michael Kors coat, $1,298, michaelkors​.com, Carhartt overalls, $208, carhartt-wip​.com; Marni shirt, $810, Marni boutiques, Giorgio Armani tie, $225, Giorgio Armani boutiques nationwide, Ahlem glasses, $445, ahlemeyewear​.com.
